simplified: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福

pronunciation.pinyin: tiān yǒu bù cè fēng yún , rén yǒu dàn xī huò fú
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2

details.simplified: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福
details.traditional: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福

meanings.value: fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity ; sth unexpected may happen at any moment
